step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched fully overhead and your fingers are spread wide.
You're making a good fist and pushing down. Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together a bit more as you tighten your muscles.
Excellent! You're extending your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep up the smooth, controlled movements.
Great work on the repetitions. Focus on maintaining an open hand and spreading fingers as you reach overhead.
You're doing well with the pumping motion. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles as you make a fist and push down.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms overhead with fingers open, then make a fist and squeeze your shoulder blades as you push down. Exhale and relax as you return to the start.
